>    Blot: Ooh! Arg! Don't not, not shoot Blot! Ah!   Blot fires 2 shots
>from his blaster at  Wildrider...

Wildrider leaps out of the slime gun shots from Blot. "Whoa there big
fella" he yells, as he hits the ground. "That stupid Maximal has gone into
hiding in that bush, maybe far in, he could be anywhere in that forest, you
wont find him just shooting at it, get in there".
